Documentation.long_help: This filter reads in float data that is packed into a binary file fomrat. It will treat the data as one long array and make a vtkTable with one column of that data. The reader uses big endian. Use the Table to ImageData filter to reshape the vtkTable.
Documentation.short_help: This filter reads in float data that is packed into a binary file fomrat. It will treat the data as one long array and make a vtkTable with one column of that data. The reader uses big endian. Use the Table to ImageData filter to reshape the vtkTable.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutputDataSetType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines the dataset type for the output of the programmable filter.

StringVectorProperty.name: Script
StringVectorProperty.default_values:
import struct import os from vtk.util import numpy_support
pdo = self.GetOutput() # vtkTable num_bytes = 4 # float. Double is 8
tn = os.stat(FileName).st_size / num_bytes tn_string = str(tn) stuff=[] with open(FileName, 'rb') as file: # tell it that each is num_bytes...float stuff=struct.unpack('>'+tn_string+'f', file.read(num_bytes*tn))
# put stuff into vtk array data = numpy_support.numpy_to_vtk(num_array=stuff, deep=True, array_type=vtk.VTK_FLOAT) if data_name == '': data_name = os.path.basename(FileName) data.SetName(data_name) # NOTE: single column of data only pdo.AddColumn(data)
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the text of a python program that the programmable source runs.
